settings.text:
Welcome to our FAQ, we are so happy to have you here and as a client.
We have tried to answer the most common questions.

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.text: Below are some common questions about shipping, returns, and exchanges

settings.title: Where does RORRY ship from?
settings.text:
We ship directly from our global warehouses (USA, UK, Japan, China, Mexico, Canada, Australia, etc). Orders are processed within 1–2 business days and usually delivered within 1-5 business days depending on your location.

Note: If an item is out of stock at your nearest warehouse, we’ll arrange shipment from another nearby location to ensure you receive your order as quickly as possible.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.text:
Once your order ships, you’ll receive an email with a tracking number. You can check your order by your tracking number with this link [https://www.track123.com/ ]

You can also contact us to check the status anytime.

settings.title: How do I start a return or exchange?
settings.text: Simply contact our support team at support@rorry.com with your order number and reason for return. We’ll guide you through the process.

settings.title: My order arrived damaged. What should I do?
settings.text: Please take photos of the damaged product and packaging, then contact us at support@rorry.com within 48 hours of receipt( please note your order number). We’ll arrange a replacement or refund right away.

settings.heading: Orders
settings.text: Below are some of are common questions about orders

settings.title: What should I do if my discount code doesn’t work?
settings.text:
If your discount code didn’t apply successfully, don’t worry! You can contact us anytime after placing your order, and we’ll refund the discount amount as a partial refund.

Please note that most discount codes cannot be combined — for example, if your order already shows a 25% discount, you won’t be able to stack another 25% off code.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

settings.title: Can I change or cancel my order after placing it?
settings.text:
If your order hasn’t shipped yet, you can contact us within 12 hours to modify or cancel it. Once shipped, changes aren’t possible.

When contacting us, please include your order number #RORRYXXXX and specify the details you’d like to change, such as the color/ model of the product or correct address.

settings.title: Frequently asked question
settings.text: This text to answer questions in as much detail as possible for you

settings.heading: Products
settings.text: Below are some common questions about our products

settings.title: How can I confirm if the product is compatible with my device?
settings.text:
Our products are designed for easy compatibility, but here are a few things to check before purchase:

  • Wired chargers: Make sure your phone’s charging port (e.g., Type-C or Lightning) matches the cable or connector type of the power bank.
  • Apple Watch only: All RORRY magnetic chargers for watches support Apple Watch models only, not Android smartwatches.
  • Wireless chargers: For MagSafe-style wireless charging, please use a magnetic phone case for the best connection.

If you’re still unsure, simply send us your device model, and our support team will help confirm compatibility right away.

settings.title: Can RORRY Power bank charge 3 devices at the same time?
settings.text: Yes, but the charging speed will be slightly slower than charging alone

settings.title: Does RORRY power bank support charging while discharging?
settings.text: Yes, the power bank supports pass-through charging with a max input and output of 5V/2A
